detaileddescription.para: CryptX provides industry-standard cryptography for the TI-84+ CE graphing calculator. The package contains three(3) separate libraries that serve different functions.

sect1.title: Getting Started with CryptX
sect1.para: Visit the CryptX Documentation for help with using the library, documentation, cryptanalysis, credits, and more.

Credits: Some algorithms sourced at least in part from B-con crypto-algorithms. Cemetech user Zeroko - information on CE randomness. beckadamtheinventor & commandblockguy - coding assistance, conversion of some C routines to assembly for speed. jacobly - modular exponentiation
